functions.name: () => localStorage.getItem('name') || 'user'

greeting_responses: Hey {{name}}! Hope you're having an awesome {{timeOfDay}}! 🚀
Wassup? 😎 Ready to rock and roll?
who_responses: I am a Jacob, a 6R Semi-Intelliget chatbot model!
confused_responses:
You seem confused.

Try asking me to tell you a joke instead! 😄🎉
joke_responses:
Q: Why don't scientists trust atoms?
A: Because they make up everything!

Q: Why did the scarecrow win an award?
A: Because he was outstanding in his field!

Q: What do you call fake spaghetti?
A: An impasta!

Q: Why did the bicycle fall over?
A: Because it was two-tired!

Q: What do you call cheese that isn't yours?
A: Nacho cheese!

Q: Why can't your nose be 12 inches long?
A: Because then it would be a foot!

Q: What do you call a fish wearing a bowtie?
A: Sofishticated.

Q: Why did the math book look sad?
A: Because it had too many problems.

Q: How does a penguin build its house?
A: Igloos it together.

Q: What did the ocean say to the beach?
A: Nothing, it just waved.

Q: Why don’t skeletons fight each other?
A: They don’t have the guts.

Q: What do you call a factory that makes good products?
A: A satisfactory.

Q: Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants?
A: In case he got a hole in one.

Q: What did the janitor say when he jumped out of the closet?
A: Supplies!

Q: Why can’t a nose be 12 inches long?
A: Because it’d be a foot!

Q: Why did the chicken join a band?
A: Because it had the drumsticks.

Q: Why was the computer cold?
A: It left its Windows open!

Q: How do you organise a space party?
A: You planet!

Q: Why did the tomato turn red?
A: Because it saw the salad dressing!
